game.title: The Lost Temple's Quest
game.objective: Uncover the Temple's Secrets and Obtain Ancient Treasures
game.description: A challenging adventure awaits you in The Lost Temple's Quest. Seek the guidance of the Wise Elder as you navigate through treacherous traps, overcome guardians, and unravel the temple's ancient mysteries. Your rewards shall be a legendary artifact and ample wealth upon completion.

task.description: Your first task is to find the trail left by previous explorers in the Jungle of Enigma. Use your observation skills and solve the riddles they have left behind.

task.objective: Unlock the Temple's Gate with the Ancestral Cipher
task.description: Once located, decipher the ancient cipher to open the main entrance. Your next challenge awaits at Main Entrance of the Temple.

task.objective: Find the Crystal Key in the Shadow Room
task.description: The Shadow Room is guarded by traps and a fierce guardian. Your agility and problem-solving skills will be put to the test.

task.objective: Solve the Temple's Riddle of Prophecy
task.description: The riddle's solution holds the key to the treasure chamber. Master your knowledge of history and mythology.

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian Serpent in the Treasure Chamber
task.description: The final challenge awaits you in the heart of the temple. Beware, for the serpent is a force to be reckoned with.
